name: Sports Betting Odds
author: Flytonic

sections.description:
PRO Live Demo
Elevate your sports betting experience with the Sports Betting Odds Plugin for WordPress.
This plugin integrates seamlessly with your WordPress website, providing real-time and accurate odds information from top sports betting providers.
It offers a user-friendly interface to help users compare odds from different providers, select their preferred odds and place bets.
The plugin supports a wide range of sports, including major leagues like NFL, NHL, NCAAF, MLB, NCAAB, NBA and more. With its responsive design, it’s accessible on any device and adapts to fit any screen size.
The Sports Betting Odds Plugin is easy to install and configure, making it a must-have tool for sports betting enthusiasts and professionals.
Stay ahead of the game and enhance your sports betting strategy with this powerful plugin today.

  • Tested with Woocommerce version 6.0.0 up to the latest version 7.2.2.
  • This plugin is compatible with PHP 7!

What Does It Do?

You can create your own sportbook
Add your Odds /probability to support your team and bookie
Add your affiliate links to the book maker
create shortcodes to display the odds on the website
There is no restrictions on the number of bookmakers and shortcodes
Stunning design for your website

What you can do with our PRO version:
You will get access to premium automated APIs for Odds
Access to Teams Ranking
Additional features to display scores of the Games
Automated Odds updated from respective bookies

Translation Ready

The plugin is ready to be translated to your local language, .pot file is included in /languages folder.

Support

Please use WordPress.org forum to ask for support, to submit bug reports, to ask questions about the free plugin, or to suggest a new feature.

Only use the contact form on our website if you’re inquiring about the PRO version.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin folder to /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin from your WordPress dashboard Plugins>Add New.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. Go to manual odds to add/edit the settings.
  4. Documentation Link: https://www.flytonic.com/free-sports-betting-odds-documentation/
sections.faq:
Something is not working! Is there a quick fix?

Check if the plugin is installed and activated
Make sure you read the documentation(https://www.flytonic.com/free-sports-betting-odds-documentation/) and follow the steps

Can I translate this plugin to my language?

Yes, this plugin is translation ready, .pot file is included in the /languages folder.

How to get access to automated sports betting odds API?

You need to upgrade to Pro version(https://www.flytonic.com/product/betting-odds-plugin-for-wordpress/) and you can get access to several other features.
